title: Hic incipit paruus Catho
author: Cato, Marcus Porcius, 234-149 B.C., attributed name.
notes: A loose translation into English by Benedict Burgh, with the original Latin text. Selections from the "Parvus Cato" and the whole of the "Catonis disticha".
The disticha, wrongly attributed to Marcus Porcius Cato, in fact date from imperial times. The "Parvus Cato" is usually erroneously attributed to Daniel Church.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
